caption: Relating to the prosecution of the criminal offense of invasive visual recording and the applicability of sex offender registration requirements to that offense.
undersanding:
Summary (under 80 words):
This bill expands the definition of invasive visual recording offenses and adds it to the list of reportable sex offenses requiring registration. It defines "place of reasonable expectation of privacy" and strengthens penalties for recording people in private spaces without consent. This law applies to all persons in Texas regardless of nationality, including Chinese immigrants, who could face sex offender registration requirements if convicted of invasive visual recording.

中文总结：
该法案扩大了侵犯性录像罪的定义，并将其列入需要登记的性犯罪名单。法案明确定义了"合理期望隐私的场所"，并加重了在私密场所未经同意进行录像的处罚。该法律适用于德克萨斯州所有人，包括中国移民在内，如果被判侵犯性录像罪，将需要进行性犯罪者登记。
